overview:
“Brian has extensive experience working with both start-up companies and large corporations. He began his career as a management consultant, delivering highly successful CRM systems for worldwide financial institutions. In 2001, he started consulting independently, building strategic online marketing programs for both product and services firms. Prior to joining kannuu, Brian was managing online analytics strategy for BMC Software in Houston. Brian received a degree in Management Information Systems from Illinois State University and currently lives and works in San Francisco.”

(Source: kannuu)
